se.kth.akok.index.geometries.point

Class PolygonPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.akok.index.geometries.point.BasicPolygonPoint
      • se.kth.akok.index.geometries.point.PolygonPoint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VisiblePoint

    public class PolygonPoint
extends BasicPolygonPoint
    A polygon point has a set of visible, shadow and boundary rays. It holds information for the corresponding rays. Finally it stores the isovist of the given point.
    Author:
    Andreas Kokkalis

      • shadowPointExists

        public boolean shadowPointExists(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate coordinate)
        Finds if the given coordinate corresponds to a known shadow point of this polygon point. If the coordinate is equal to a known shadow point coordinate, or if it is within the minimum defined distance, then it considers it the same.
        Parameters:
        Coordinate - of the shadow point in question.
        Returns:
        true if the shadow point already exists for the given polygon point.

      • isVisiblePoint

        public boolean isVisiblePoint(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate coordinate)
        Finds if the given coordinate corresponds to a visible point already defined for this polygon point. If the coordinate is equal to a known visible point coordinate, or if it is within the minimum defined distance, then it considers it the same.
        Parameters:
        coordinate -
        Returns:
        true if the coordinate already exists as a visible point.
